title: Object
name: Object
description: Lets you call methods in COM, CORBA, and JAVA objects.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The object type. You can omit this attribute or specify component. Lucee automatically sets the type to component.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description:
- create: instantiates a COM object (typically, a DLL) before invoking methods or properties.
- connect: connects to a COM object (typically, an EXE) running on server.

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: Component ProgID for the object to invoke. When using Java stubs to connect to the COM object, the class must be the ProgID of the COM object.

attributes.name: context
attributes.description:
-  inproc
    - local
    - remote

In Windows, if not specified, uses Registry setting.

attributes.name: delimiters
attributes.description: if specified a classpath, use as delimiter for the entries, default is comma.

attributes.name: server
attributes.description:
Server name, using Universal Naming Convention (UNC) or Domain Name Serve (DNS) convention, in one of these forms:

    * \\lanserver
    * lanserver
    * http://www.servername.com
    * www.servername.com
    * 127.0.0.1

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description:
Sets arguments for a call to init_orb. Use this attribute only for VisiBroker ORBs. It is available on C++, Version 3.2. The value must be in the form:
locale = " -ORBagentAddr 199.99.129.33 -ORBagentPort 19000"

Each type-value pair must start with a hyphen.

attributes.name: webservice
attributes.description: The absolute URL of the web service.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: The user name to use to access the web service. If the webservice attribute specifies a web service configured name in the Lucee Administrator, overrides any user name specified in the Administrator entry.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The password to use to access the web service. If the webservice attribute specifies a web service name configured in the Lucee Administrator, overrides any password specified in the Administrator entry.

attributes.name: proxyServer
attributes.description: The proxy server required to access the web service URL.

attributes.name: proxyPort
attributes.description: The port to use on the proxy server.

attributes.name: proxyUser
attributes.description: The user ID to send to the proxy server.

attributes.name: proxyPassword
attributes.description: The user's password on the proxy server.
